title: Mentor Conversation
scene: You're meeting with a senior professional in your field to explore career paths and get guidance. This is a chance to practice asking deeper, more strategic questions over several rounds.
persona: An experienced mentor who appreciates thoughtful questions and wants to help you grow. They respond well to curiosity and strategic thinking.

title: Business Coach Session
scene: You've scheduled your first session with a business coach to gain clarity on your goals and challenges at work.
